EmailTemplate.description: Automated Rejection Email sent back to Owner (e.g. Account Executive) indicating product was rejected -This email is initiated when the product has been rejected by the Onsite Clinics Approver
EmailTemplate.name: ANA-QLIA - Onsite Clinics Rejection Opportunity Owner Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Onsite Clinics Rejected for {!QuoteLineItemApproval__c.ClientName__c}
